title: Predicting Bloom Date of Cherry Blossoms

A team and I competed in [George Mason University's annual competition](https://www.gmu.edu/news/2022-03/mason-cherry-blossom-predictions-play-statistics) to predict the date of cherry blossom bloom in DC. Using statistical computing, decision trees, and econometrics in R, our poster is below.<br> <br> <br>
